name: G-Zubble
description:
G-Zubble is a 2D puzzle-adventure game created by a team of 5 in the Spring of 2022.  The animation is a stand-out element in this simple puzzle game, but beyond the visuals, you will find a wealth of technical achievements in the game's mechanics.  The simplicity in the game's rules and mechanics makes it so enjoyable to play.

Team:

Malik R - Programming

Chris C - Art

Kyle R - Design

Liam B - Sound

Calla K - Animation and Programming

How To Play:

Click and drag the mouse to give the bubble force.  Avoid the spikes and monsters to make it to the end of the level.
